short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a badge in the browser for the next train/bus selected

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of arriving at the bus/train stop and just miss it by few seconds? This extension is what you need! Tube For London NEXT is showing live arrivals, the bus/train station in your browser with a real time badge! 

1. Select your interest station
2. Hand pick a list of bus line you want to track
3. Visualise at any time when in the next departure!
